messages.subject: vote!! Naomi Aldort on Change.org
messages.msgSnippet: Deadline is tonight!! forwarded message - I just thought I would pass this along on here in case anyone wants to go to Change.org to vote for Naomi s
messages.messageBody:
Deadline is tonight!!

forwarded message -

I just thought I would pass this along on here in case anyone wants to
go to
Change.org to vote for Naomi's recommendation. It is about supporting
mothers so that they are able to stay home to rasie their children instead
of being forced to put them in daycare.

http://www.change.org/ideas/view/support_for_mothers_and_children


(from Caren: just click the 56 vote on the left side of the page, and
you'll be prompted to register. When you get your confirmation, you'll
need to click to vote again, but it's quick and painless!)

Here is what her e-mail said:


1) The opportunity is urgent as now is the deadline (the 31st at
midnight):
If you would like to make your voice heard with the new president, please
vote on my parenting recommendation and on my other posts at
change.org. You
will have to sign up but you will not get emails as a result of it and
it is
easy and quick. If we get enough votes by Wednesday midnight, it will be
seen by Obama's management. It takes a couple of thousands votes so it
will
take a miracle to get enough votes since I just created it but there are
many thousands of us so it is possible. Feel free to pass it on.
http://www.change.org/ideas/view/support_for_mothers_and_children
